pages.title: Tin Foil Hat Mode
pages.description: Privacy-first settings that keep your data off the menu.
pages.tip: Flip the homepage switch to swap the Netlify form for offline instructions.

pages.title: Gremlin Grease
pages.description: A micro-reward that slides you back into flow without guilt.
pages.tip: Five minutes of something silly counts. The point is momentum, not punishment.

pages.title: Focus Bubble
pages.description: A distraction-free zone with automatic nudge shields.
pages.tip: Pair with a 20-minute chaos clock to get in and out before your brain rebels.

pages.title: Beat your baseline
pages.description: Gamify tiny wins to outpace yesterday, not the internet.
pages.tip: Log the smallest move that nudged the metric. Yesterday is the only rival.

pages.title: Chaos Clocking
pages.description: Timeboxing for people who hate timeboxes. Elastic, forgiving, effective.
pages.tip: Set a stretch window: start in the first 5 minutes, finish within 30.

pages.title: Momentum Ledger
pages.description: A weekly gut-check on what actually moved the needle (and what didnâ€™t).
pages.tip: Three columns: Wins, Wobbles, Keepers. Fill before Sunday night.

pages.title: Signal Stash
pages.description: A bookmark folder of reminders, scripts, and dopamine triggers you can trust.
pages.tip: Color-code by energy level so you know which stash to open on low-fuel days.

pages.title: Baseline Buddy
pages.description: A check-in ritual with someone who gets the neurospice, no judgment allowed.
pages.tip: Share your top three planned moves, then debrief on what actually happened.
